Sources: NIST SP 800-162 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-162.pdf), OWASP Access Control Cheat Sheet (https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Access_Control_Cheat_Sheet.html), AWS Lambda IAM (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/lambda-intro-execution-role.html), Serverless Framework Security Best Practices. **Concept Map (Textual):** Function Permission Management (central) → Models: RBAC (roles), ABAC (attributes) → Elements: Subject/Object/Action/Environment → Principles: Least Privilege, Zero-Trust → Implementation: IAM Roles, Policy as Code (OPA) → Integration: CI/CD, Monitoring. **Learning Objectives:** [Insert the learning_objectives array here]. **Scaffolding Layers:** [Insert the scaffolding_layers array here]. Ensure 10-15 cards per layer, progressing from simple recall to complex creation. **Active Learning Ties:** Reference components where relevant (e.g., 'Relates to debate on RBAC vs ABAC'). **Generation Instructions:** Create 40-60 flashcards following the exact schema: Front (Question: Cloze/QA/MCQ), Back (Answer + Explanation + Bloom's Level + Layer + Source).
